pipeline_tag: text2text-generation

---

fine-tune flan-t5-xl with share gpt dataset

Traing Parameter

---
"gradient_accumulation_steps": 64

"learning_rate":               0.0005

"max_source_length":           512

"max_target_length":           512

"model_name_or_path":          google/flan-t5-xl

"seed":                        42

"train_batch_size":            1

"train_epochs":                1

"weight_decay":                0.0

---

Example Python Code :

from typing import Dict, List, Any

from transformers import AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM, AutoTokenizer

import torch

path="cloudyu/Flan-T5-ShareGPT-XL-3B"

model =  AutoModelForSeq2SeqLM.from_pretrained(path, device_map="auto" )

tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(path)

inputs = "write a story about a young man visiting Yosemite and then surprised by waterfall"

while len(inputs)>0:

  input_ids = tokenizer(inputs, return_tensors="pt").input_ids.to('cuda') 
  
  outputs = model.generate(input_ids, max_new_tokens=2048, do_sample=True, temperature=0.9,repetition_penalty=1.1 )
  
  prediction = tokenizer.decode(outputs[0], skip_special_tokens=True)
  
  print(prediction)
  
  inputs = input()

Example output:

Once upon a time, in a lush green valley nestled in the shadow of the Sierra Nevada mountains, a young man decided to visit Yosemite. He was excited at the prospect of experiencing some natural beauty for the first time. One morning, he decided to hike to the top of one of the cliffs overlooking the valley. As he approached the summit, his eyes were drawn to the stunning view of the Yosemite Falls. The waterfall dropped gently down into a picturesque deep bowl, creating a majestic sight to behold. As he continued along, it became apparent that there was more to the falls than he was aware of. As he stood at the edge of the waterfall, he felt a rush of joy and excitement wash over him. He couldn't believe his eyes when he finally came to the end of the trail. The fall was so unexpected, he had no idea what to expect or how the falls would continue to flow down into the valley. In his heart, he felt grateful, and he knew that he had seen something truly special while exploring Yosemite Valley.
